remarks: Associative law for inner product.  Equation I2 of [Ponnusamy] p. 363.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
phlsrng.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
phllmhm.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
phllmhm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipdir.f $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
ipass.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
ipass.p $e |- .X. = ( .r ` F ) $.
ipass $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( ( A .x. B ) ., C ) = ( A .X. ( B ., C ) ) ) $.
